channel.title: NPC help
channel.description: Hey I'm trying to change which way the NPC faces, so he is facing North. This is the code I put in Autospawn.cfg. Which one do I change to make him face a different way? [code]spawn = 945 1970 5003 0 0 0 0 0 1 Runescape[/code]
